content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for some ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work. 

The game screen contains a lot of sex toys in Sex Shop and a lot of Polish vodka in "Vodka Store" (please check the screenshots).

Also may face a variety of criminal activities such as theft, robbing. The Bandtyko Gang is ruthless.
